reasoning: Desmoid tumors (aggressive fibromatosis) have documented incidence of 2-4 per million per year (0.2-0.4 per 100k). Using midpoint estimate of 0.3 per 100k based on population-based registry data.
source: Reitamo JJ et al. (1982). The desmoid tumor. I. Incidence, sex-, age- and anatomical distribution in the Finnish population. Am J Clin Pathol. 77(6):665-673
